website_summaries.verdict: Versatile hub is expensive, but it'll give you multiple connection options for all kinds of data transfers.
pros: Gives you seven different ports, including a 4K HDMI port, three USB 3.0 ports, and a USB-C power port for those devices that need extra power
Also features an SD card reader and a micro-SD card reader
Includes three different colors to match Apple devices
cons: It's expensive, so unless you need a large variety of connection options, you'll pay too much

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, Beautiful Design, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After a long search I had bought two devices from this company, including this one. I love Apple design but their stupid focus on making laptops thin at the cost of usability is, well, wearing thin. The sheer number of dongles one needs makes it an ugly situation thanks to Apple. However these devices from Charjen Pro are beautifully designed to complement the MacBook Pro and let me plug many of the daily use things in through one USB C port. I’m told the current model hub is somewhat improved over the first version I bought. The company’s people are customer service focused. I’ve ordered the new one and will update the review based on how it works out.
customer_reviews.author: IMRAN™

customer_reviews.title: only use hdmi for external monitor... every ...
customer_reviews.text: only use hdmi for external monitor...every 10-15 minutes the screen will turn blue and have to plug back in to fix...kind of annoying update: company sent me a replacement and love letter...changed to 5 stars...great customer service. Thanks guys
customer_reviews.author: LBas90

customer_reviews.title: Smart Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I've had no issues. Doesn't get hot as mentioned in other product's reviews. Also have had no issues with any of the ports. Something quick to note though... checking the Power in the System Information shows some wattage discrepancies between using the straight wall charger, and it plugged in through the this adapter Wall > MBP - 60W Wall > Adapter > MBP - 49W This means that you won't charge as quickly, and depending on the MBP you may not charge faster than you use... so basically just don't use it as your primary port
customer_reviews.author: SUAShawn

customer_reviews.title: Only supports 2 simultaneous connections
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of junk. It has 7 ports, sure, but you can only use 2 that require power at once. For example, if you have 3 USB's in there, or 1 HDMI and 2 USB's, it will not only heat up, but start making buzzing noises, and then in very short order, die. It can't handle the power output. You can only have 2 things plugged in at once, such as an HDMI and 1 USB - which defeats the point of a hub. Try a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doubly Faulty Product, Horrid Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I think 5 star reviews until you have had it a few weeks.. LOST DATA on two drives due to the constant losing connection. Bother the WIRE was faulty (some kind of short) and the unit's internal chip... Customer service: Made me send a VIDEO to prove it would lose connection with HDMI, discs constantly and touching it gently or moving the wire would cause it! Promised an exchange, but then just refunded.. No explanation, no communication. Very resentful at ME because their product was faulty! Wow. P.S. Hyperdrive products: Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Gable

customer_reviews.title: USB ports worked great. SD card DOES NOT WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: USB ports worked great. SD card DOES NOT WORK AT ALL! So annoying as I need all of them for work. Found out the hard way when critical footage needed to be transferred and the SD card reader wouldn't work. To confirm it wasn't simply an issue with the SD card, I plugged it into a laptop that has an SD port - NO PROBLEMS. UGH. Have to go spend money on ANOTHER adapter. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product is not iPad Pro compatible. It will connect and register as connected but will not move files or allow you to mirror the screen through the hdmi. I contacted the developer for help and was told that the device has limited compatibility due to Apple restrictions. There may be ways to make this function for you. I am admittedly a low to medium tech person. If there are no instructions, I’m likely in trouble. I was hoping for a little customer support from the company but was left wanting.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tenny

customer_reviews.title: Don't Get a USB-C hub when you really need a Thunderbolt 3 Dock
customer_reviews.text: Overall performance was nonexistent. Everything would connect, but transfer rates were awful; even the HDMI dismay would lag and become unusable. Connecting an external SSD was also a bad idea. I tried on both my Mac Air and MacBook Pro. I was really frustrated until I realized there was a difference between USB-C hubs and Thunderbolt 3. Who Knew? I returned and spent the extra money for a TB3 hub and the difference was worth every penny. I gave 2 stars since maybe for someone's setup it would work. I just recommend making sure this will work for you before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: USB-A and USB-C ports don't work
customer_reviews.text: USB-A ports wouldn't mount my USB stick unless it was also connected to power via USB-C. USB-A ports wouldn't mount my hard drive at all. Later the USB-C connection stopped providing power to the laptop. HDMI seemed to work fine, and I didn't test the SD slots. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Features, Poor Quality, Laster 2 good months
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1 I liked the setup and design of this chajen pro USB C hub, HM+DMI , 3 usb a, SD/ SD micro slot and USB passthrough. 2 Form factor is decent, not to large Cons: Stopped workings shortly after purchase. After two months, 1 HDMI output began to flicker, 2 Micro SD card slot never worked, 3 SD card slot stopped functioning / connection not consistent Its now almost useless. I would like a replacement unit, but the window to return through amazon is closed. I can only home that Charjen reaches out in response to this review At this time, I cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review!  Fantastic Bit Of Kit!
customer_reviews.text: If I had to quibble about anything it would be that I wish the cord was a smidgen longer. I primarily use this on a Microsoft Surface Book 2 and the USB-C is on the right side. When working in a small area using a mouse pad it makes that side of the workspace a little cluttered, considering the power port is right behind the USB-C. Other than that - works beautifully, looks great, outstanding build quality, exceptional performance! Another little known feature (at least to me) is that this beauty also works with the iPad Pro (2nd Generation) allowing quick import of photos without having to connect to anything else. Super fast too!
customer_reviews.author: VNB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Companion for the MacBook Pro 16
customer_reviews.text: I recently picked up a MacBook Pro 16 in order to replace my failing MacMini 2013, and in the process, I had to find a way to connect all of my USB-A devices, as well as my external display to my new MacBook Pro 16. I tried a few different Thunderbolt 3 / USB-C devices, and I was disappointed, to say the least. I just plugged in this new Charjen Pro USB-C hub, and it perfectly passed on the power to my MacBook Pro 16, and my display connected, and my devices all worked perfectly. If you have one of the new MacBook Pro 16 machines, you have found the right way to connect your devices!
customer_reviews.author: Mikkel Natas

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable hub for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new laptop that only has usb-c ports so I needed an adapter. Coincidentally Matt Granger put out a video comparing hubs and he rated this one high so I bought it. Although I haven’t done any speed testing it seems to work ok. The hdmi and usb 3.0 ports is mainly what I needed since my laptop already has three usb-c ports and a sd slot. So far I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben T

customer_reviews.title: Runs MUCH TOO HOT! I wish I could get my money back!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this unit for a couple months now. The data flow is OK but this unit runs like a family room space heater. I am not kidding, this unit gets so hot that I hate letting it sit on the computer lap tray that my MB Pro 2018 sits on. It gets really hot with ONLY 1 USB flash drive connected. I can imagine it will likely burn up if I actually connect more than 1 device to this unit. I really regret that I did not discover this until it was too late to return it. I DO NOT recommend this unit, solely because of how HOT THIS UNIT GETS while connected to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: dalanprue

customer_reviews.title: Good hub, great support
customer_reviews.text: The good: this is a good hub, it has plenty of ports, it feels well built, and the SD card slots are perfect for travelling photographers. The bad: running the power cable through the hub makes it buzz and heat up (I have a MacBook Pro/61W power supply). Under load, the hub sounds a bit like a hard drive... It's probably not a risk, but it does not inspire confidence in the design, and the noise is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: David Chatenay

customer_reviews.title: Yes it DOES charge a 2020 iPad Pro 12.9” gen 4
customer_reviews.text: So when I first plugged it in it seemed to not be charging my IPad Pro 12.9” gen. 4 HOWEVER after reading some of the other reviews on a different product as I was about to return this one, I realized the problem is in fact the power brick that comes with the iPad, it is very low wattage, so I grabbed a 30w Charger I have from a laptop and the pass through charge worked fine on this. So BEFORE you return this try upgrading your power brick (its about 43 bucks BUT it makes my iPad charge way faster even when not using this hub)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for power pass-through as claimed in the description
customer_reviews.text: This product seems well made and durable. That said, it does not have true USB-C charging as stated (USB 3.1 spec). The power pass-through is LOW power, perhaps good enough for a phone or small tablet. With just a USB-3 flash drive attached, my 10" pad was slowly losing power, not charging. I don't see how it would be possible to charge a pad or laptop as they state in the description. My pad (a 2019 Samsung Tab A) put up the message pictured, indicating a typical 1 Amp source, not a 1.5 - 2 Amp source needed by larger devices.
customer_reviews.author: John from MKE

customer_reviews.title: Most Highly Reviewed USB-C hub/dongle
customer_reviews.text: With the new Apple products being only USB-C and travel in my schedule I needed a USB-C hub. I searched reviews and found that this product got the highest ratings. I am very pleased with it. It is handsome and solid and it works. You can plug it into your USB-C port on the Apple and use it for regular USB connections, 1 USB-C connection, an SD card slot, modular connector and one I slot that is a mystery to me. I was hoping for more USB-C ports, but I haven't found anything like that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cherpel

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This hub worked ok but completely stopped working after a year and a half. Important to note that this won't charge up your macbook pro at the same time. I would have liked this to last at least two years. I'm disappointed in the product. I reached out to the manufacturer but did not receive a reply.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge over 49 watts, not so good for 15" macbook pro
customer_reviews.text: Generally a useful device, but I only get 49 watts of charging through it - see the photo. If you want your 15" macbook pro or charge at full speed, you have to plug your charger directly to your laptop. This fact should be a lot clearer in the description. There are too many reviews and questions to find this information. You can see your charging power via apple menu->About this Mac->Hardware/power, scroll to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Product finish looks good and compliments the Mac
customer_reviews.text: Small and unobtrusive, just what I wanted as a traveling adapter for 2018 MacbookPro with only two Usb-C ports. Decided on this over the other direct connection types as reviews had them disconnecting if the Laptop was moved. This will not have that issue as the USB-C connection is solid and cable length is not too long/too short. Tried some speed tests with usb drives and everything seemed on par with direct connection. Product finish looks good and compliments the MacBook. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Important note: Does not allow usbc passthru
customer_reviews.text: Read the fine print. It’s breezes over briefly in the description but If you’re expecting to extend your usb-c port with this and still be able to mount a usb-c powered harddrive through it, you’re going to have a bad time. YOU CANNOT MOUNT A HARD DRIVE ATTACHED TO THIS DONGLE. Matter of fact there aren’t any usb-c hubs out there that can do that so you can cut your search short. Also, your transfer speeds are limited to 5Gbps through this ..so there is that too. But the pros are that this is well built and I haven’t had any issues with it. It’s actually come in handy a couple times with microSD and the SD slots.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Charges slowly - unreliable link to hard drives
customer_reviews.text: The device has reasonable build quality, and works for the most part. There are two main reasons I do not recommend it: • When connecting external hard drives to a USB port, 8 out of 10 times the drive does not mount (the same drive will mount just fine if connected using a USB 3 to USB c dongle). • Power transfer is severely limited – the computer will charge at a much slower rate, compared to connecting the power supply directly to the computer's USB c port. I contacted CharJenPro about these issues through their standard support channels, but did not hear back from them after several days.
customer_reviews.author: gpano

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Small and effective
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 6 months now and it is simply flawless. It works well with my HP x360 and gives me all the ports I need. If there is one port I would like to have seen added to a next gen adapter (even though I've not needed) it would be an Ethernet port. CharGen is a small company who care about their products, customers and have designed a durable device that stands out from the crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my attachments needed for Mac Pro 2018.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very useful considering you need the dongle attachments for your USB and other plug ins. What I like is the unit has various plug ins and it matches my silver Mac Pro. And they also have the Space Grey one to match too. The quality is solid and so far has been working quite well. I have only used it for awhile but so far working great. I will say customer service is great, in fact the owners sent me a Christmas card. I can highly recommend this product plus I did a lot of research with various products like this and decided on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Lady

customer_reviews.title: Small, has exactly what I need and does not get hot!
customer_reviews.text: I researched many different brands, taking my time to understand which product provided what I was most needing. After reading product description and countless customer reviews, I decided on this USB-C 3.1 CharJenPro Certified Adapter because it was small and light-weight, it had exactly the plug-ins I would use AND it did not get hot (it was rated very highly by other customers who bought the product!) Not having to worry about an adapter getting too hot is very important to me! So happy I took the time to research this excellent product. I will purchase fro CharJenPro again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice USB-C Hub
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since my new MacBook Pro 16 needs to be able to access a variety of media. Since getting it a few days ago I have used it to connect to a flatscreen TV so I could display my files to a group of folks at a meeting. The HDMI port worked perfectly for that purpose. I have not tried the other ports yet, but have no doubt they will work just fine. The hub is nice looking and appears to be of very high quality. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Durango Wheels

customer_reviews.title: It works! It works!!! Moving to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works! It works!!! Moving to the 2017 Macbook Pro, the biggest frustration has been the USB-C to USB situation, and I've gone through a couple of other hubs that have been junk. I purchased the CharJen based off reviews, and sure enough - plugged my charger, HDMI + 3 USB devices, plugged it in and BOOM, everything is working exactly as it should. This $89 gadget saved my $3000 macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Nutbeem

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind!
customer_reviews.text: Found this product online after searching in stores and found that nothing was comparable to its small size, variety of ports, and trustworthiness. Very compelling that it is a family run business and they are very set on making sure their customers are happy with their purchase. Doesn't get too hot, is good quality, and once again the only one i could find with so many useful port options! Will be buying again from this company if i need something like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sylva

customer_reviews.title: Solid, reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the HyperDrive dock for my MacBook Pro, and I couldn't be happier. The HyperDrive wobbles like crazy and doesn't remain tightly connected to the MacBook Pro without duct tape. No such problem here. The CharJenPro hub sits tightly in the USB-C/Thunderbolt 3 port, with no wiggle or wobble whatsoever. I also like that the CharJenPro has a cable which allows the hub to sit away from the MacBook Pro; although if I had one request, it would be that the connecting cable be a little bit longer so I can tuck the hub out of view. I purchased a short USB-C extension cable which solved that issue. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: GSparks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for USB-C Macbooks!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my MacBook Pro, and looks sleek. Only issue I have found is if you disconnect pass-through USB-C power, it will temporarily disconnect the connected devices (like hard drives.) I wish it would transition seamlessly, but I just use a different power port on my Mac, and that works fine. The original unit I received was defective (HDMI was not working) but got a quick replacement, which has worked perfectly ever since! Definitely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Small, solid, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the CharJenPro USB C hub for my 16" MacBook Pro. I had purchased a much more expensive hub but found it to be too bulky and don't like the fact that it has to be plugged into an outlet to work. That destroys the portability of a laptop. But this hub is made of metal, it's small, plugs into the side of the computer, and you're ready to go. Build seems top quality. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: A quality dongle is important for macs. This one is great because it has high functioning ports and speeds that match. Like most dongles, it lets me down a bit cause of the design. I love how it matches/functions with my mid/late 2018 (newst model at the time of this post) Mac perfectly but the hanging dongle that needs to have your power supply USB C inserted to it kind of bothers me. However its positive in the fact that it frees up your other 3 USB C ports. Gets a bit warm as well.
customer_reviews.author: daniel derubis sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great to solve mac issues
customer_reviews.text: Great, works to solve MAC HORRIBLE DESITION of having only type c connectors. if you need to load mouse, keyboard, and memory stick and monitor make sure to connect power to the rear end. So far so good. It gets a lot of heat, make sure to have it in a place clear with air, do not put stuff over or surrounding it. Works well with my 24" 1080 screen. Love it so far. One con... The connector to the computer feels jiggly... Probably need to improve that.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Verdad

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for external USB DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this USB-C for my new MacBook Pro; unfortunately my MacBook didn't arrive for three weeks after placing this order and I didn't open my USB-C unintentionally after the return by date had passed. I plugged in my USB-C and tried to use my porable DVD player and nothing; Not one thing happened. I tried the DVD player on another computer and it work so I tried it again using my USB-C NOTHINGl! I paid too much money for this not to work!
customer_reviews.author: Baskin_Family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing technology, requirement for later model MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: So I read all of the reviews and the comparison articles on the USB C hubs went with the CharJenPro Hub. As you can see by the attached picture am running HDMI, the Apple charging cable, SD Mini card (can't see it's in the hub), my old USB Hub with network, mouse, keyboard, fan. The CharJenPro works perfectly. No heat issues, no charging issues, does exactly as what is designed. I usually have about 60-70 tabs open in Chrome and Safari, really putting a strain on my 2018 MacBook Pro and the CharJenPro keeps the battery recharged at 100%. Highly, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great device, and best solution for me
customer_reviews.text: This hub is exactly what I was looking for and well worth the price. So far no problems at all with performance. Have not connected HDMI to a monitor yet, but will check that soon. Space gray color matches the MacBook space gray. This device has no ethernet port, but that was not a deal breaker for me. Overall, I'm very happy and highly recommend. I'd like to see CharJenPro or maybe a 3rd party come out with a nice little fitted case/pouch for travel.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyBird

customer_reviews.title: All Macbook Pro Users Should Get This Item
customer_reviews.text: With the new macbooks only having USB C ports, this item has been a great add on. I have only used it a few times so far, but no problems yet and plugging it in is a breeze. I would buy this product again and I just hope that it lasts for a long time. Plus the company seems very down to earth and great with customer service. They personally reached out to me to thank me for supporting their product.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best USB-C hub available....your search is over.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best USB-C hub adapter available! The color is a perfect match to the current 2018 MacBook Pro (Space Grey). Product is extremely well made—constructed of durable aluminum. If you are looking for an adapter to connect peripherals to your MacBook Pro, your search is over. Customer service at CharJen was also top tier when I requested a replacement unit due to connection failure with my original. The subsequent service I received from a representative named Cindy was absolutely phenomenal. My issue was resolved quickly and efficiently, and it was a nice reminder that truly professional customer service still exists. I will shop CharJenPro products again, and consider myself a lifelong customer.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Lazerus

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with my Space Grey MBP. Just plug the one USB-C cable in and I've got power, mouse, USB Flash drive, external HDD, SD card and microSD card all at once! (and an extra screen, but I don't have a 2nd screen). Really like the high-quality metal finish, clean lines and design too. The only issue I found is that the normal size SD card slot is mounted a little high in mine, which makes for a tight fit when using an SD card in it. But it seems to get better over repeated use, and it still reads my cards fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good adapter
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily with my Macbook Pro, it works very well, and provides all the needs I have due to the lack of ports in the macbook. The only problem I found so far is a bit of lag with my wireless Logitech mouse, but to be far, pretty much all mouses perform poorly on mac, so let's say I just notice "a bit" more lag than what usually feels on mac.
customer_reviews.author: Juanjo

customer_reviews.title: The best hub among all I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hub that I've ever had. It's a bit pricey, but the quality is impeccable. Very nice design, material, and finishing. All the ports work without any problems, and it really looks good with Mac. Their customer service is also very prompt and responsible. For those who are looking for a high-quality product, I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: nCLEWs

customer_reviews.title: Great hub from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: Great little hub! Looks great, too. I'm running a 2017 15" MacBook Pro w/ touch bar, and have it hooked up to a 27" Samsung 4k monitor via HDMI, two external USB drives, and a wireless keyboard. I was hoping for an audio port, too, but I have the sound hooked up to my monitor, so that works fine. At first it was acting buggy, but I contacted the company, and they said I had to have the MBP's power supply plugged into the hub to power the devices, and that fixed the problem. Great company with great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nevins

customer_reviews.title: somehow it blocks my wifi connection when is plugged
customer_reviews.text: cons::it gets a 2star for me,, because somehow when its plugged in, the wifi stop working and when i unplug it, inmediatly wifi internet start working again... pro; nice solid built quality feels very premium UPDATE: July,9,2018 Somehow its working perfectly the last 6 times i use it. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: YHG

customer_reviews.title: Works great, does everything I expect it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I use it with my MacBook Pro on a daily basis. I've had it for 3 months now, no issues. Mostly use it with a usb trackball and occasionally use the HDMI out for a second monitor. I like that I can use it with other laptop models, should I switch laptops. The only downside is the cables can be a little messy looking when you have several things plugged in, and not as convenient to travel with as a result. If their Mac bar version had another USB-C port on it, I would have preferred to have it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bodell

customer_reviews.title: Best Dongle for Macbook Pro Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: I like that it matches the color of my Macbook Pro, but not only that the performance for the price of this thing is great! Lots of options on this. I also like that I have attach my power USB C cable to it and not loose another port. Works fantastic and gives me all the missing ports. If you have to buy a dongle this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Feinberg

customer_reviews.title: Works good, except when using HDMI it gets really hot
customer_reviews.text: Works good, except when using HDMI it gets really hot. Another issue is that when power is connected to the usb-c power port on this device, when power is disconnected, devices(usb /microsd) cards will be disconnected as well. (like a mini power surge) causing interruption if you are transferring data to connected devices.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dock. Works great with my new MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dock. Works great with my new MacBook Pro. Only minor complaint is that it does not seem to charge my iPad (technically it will charge, but it says "not charging" and will charge very slowly). Works great for my iPhone and all other accessories though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for a year
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this little adapter, and ever had any issues with it for 15 months, then this morning it gave up the ghost and is using too much power that my mac straight up rejects it. I reset my SMC and every other dongle I have works fine still, so it's definitely dead. It never left my desk, and I never dropped it, it just got worn out from standard daily use. I recommend this if you don't mind possibly replacing it in a year's time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add external devices to my MacBook Pro 15”. It works very well and data moves quickly between the connected drives and the MacBook Pro. I really like that it is small and takes very little room on the lap desk. The price is good and quality seem very acceptable to me. I have been using it for a few weeks with three external devices connected constantly and haven’t noticed any issues. The device has stayed cool during heavy use. I recommend it for anyone with a computer that needs external devices via usb-3.
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good company, good vibes!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this CharJen hub for six months now and am still so please with this purchase. First found them on YouTube where a person reviewed the company as well as the product. The product is built well, holds up to travel well, is designed well and has a company that cares about what it has created. You can purchase with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: as when I plug the dongle into the back of the Apple display instead it worked fine. Other than the issue above it's an excellen
customer_reviews.text: I have a wireless mouse that requires a USB dongle, the mouse would lag a lot, not sure why. It was definitely this adapter, as when I plug the dongle into the back of the Apple display instead it worked fine. Other than the issue above it's an excellent adapter. Style is great as it matches the MBP really well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: SD Card Reader Does Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: Just a little over 1 year after purchasing this hub and the SD card reader port does not work. However, I have not tried it in months, so who knows hold long it's been not working. I'm not impressed and can't recommend this product. Read the reviews.... there are many customers that have had defective units where the SD or Micro SD readers don't work. I would love to see the company contact me to replace the unit. For the money I spent the reader should work for more than a year. Especially given I don't use it often. Grrrr!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. At its price you get a high quality hub and seams to be pretty robust. It is a nice match to the space grey finishes of macbooks and doesn't slide around due to the rubber feet. Their 12 month warranty is also really nice as I was able to get a replacement due to a faulty port.
customer_reviews.author: ahh

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when buying a MacBook Pro you would think it would include all of these poets already built into it. But this little gadget fixes all of those issues! It has every port I need all in a tiny little gadget! The quality is good and all of the ports seem to work great! I’ve had mine for about 2 years now and it works great still! Customer service is crazy good too!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great out of the box on a 15" Macbook Pro w/ Touchbar (late 2016)
customer_reviews.text: First impressions: solidly built, all ports work (SD card, USB, HDMI to 4K display), small size but ports are not crammed together. The only issue is that this item gets pretty hot in the following case: USBC charger plugged in, HDMI output, reading lots of data from an SD card. I just unplugged the power connector and used another laptop port and that seemed to help. I'll update the review if something goes wrong, but I'm very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leo H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect one for that
customer_reviews.text: Tried all the ports and everything works. Not looking for anything spectacular. Just a all-in-one dongle that will give me the ports when I need them. This is the perfect one for that. I did tons of research before my purchase. I mean tons of research because I was considering the one that plugs into the side that sits snug to the MacBook. I check to see reviews on data transfer from a memory card or external hd. This was the best for the price that didn’t overheat or make a hissing sound like some others I considered.
customer_reviews.author: Q Malik

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 15” MacBook Pro and this works well when I have to connect flash drives or hdmi. The only problem is that sometimes flash drives take a but too much effort to insert, otherwise, I have not had any major problems. This is a must have. I always have mine in my backpack. I must also make mention of the packaging as it has a personalized feel to it. Totally worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Justin J

customer_reviews.title: Great but SD Card reader works intermittently after a couple months of use
customer_reviews.text: Def a necessity of a Mac Book Pro...the attachment has worked great since I purchased it a couple months ago. Everything is still working properly accept for the SC card reader, sometimes it works & sometimes it doesn't...very frustrating as I need it to upload pictures all the time since I do photography.
customer_reviews.author: Luckey219

customer_reviews.title: USB C Hub for traveling and portability
customer_reviews.text: CharJenPro USB C Hub with 4K HDMI, SD, Micro SD, and 3 USB 3.0 in Space Grey, White Cable is just the right thing for increase connectivity while maintaining a mobile profile. The build quality is excellent and the USB-C cable attachment gives me the connection I prefer using a hard shell cover on my MBP 16”. I would suggest having a proper carrying case or compartment to it in to keep it in when traveling. Used the hub with three external hard drive, SD card, micro SD card and the HDMI connection without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Tan

customer_reviews.title: It's a Hub, not sure what else to say in a headline.
customer_reviews.text: I moved from a 2013 MacBook Pro to a 2017 MacBook 12". I have a gdrive and a DVD player/burner that I used with my old macBook and wanted to use with the new one. However, there weren't ports on the new one. The hub lets me plug in all my peripherals plus a SanDisk flash drive. Keeps me doing all the things I like to do.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Ann Schmearer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for Samsung dex
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my s10 plus. I have a hdmi plugged in for my screen, and a usb for my mouse and keyboard. Problem is that when I use my Samsung fast charger, it does not fast charge my phone which is connected to it. So ultimately I am loosing power as I use it. When I plug in my 60w charger, then I get fast charging for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chaim Pinchus

customer_reviews.title: Broke USB
customer_reviews.text: I try not to give negative reviews. I do so when an item is terrible. I just started using the hub less than a week. The slots for the USB are really tight and I'll fitting. The shell casing to USB to my cordless mouse is stuck inside the hub. I can't remove it bc it's so tight. The pieces fell apart. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allisea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I believe Charjen products are awesome and fully reliable; other brands work quite poor in comparisson to Charjen's products speaking of USB dongles and adaptors. As a matter if fact I believe Charjen is a fully reliable enterprise due to its excellence in customer service and great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: carlosaflorestamez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have two new MacBook Pros. With 4 lighting ports, we needed an adaptor. Chose this one because it would pug into the MacBook. I wanted the type of adaptor that fit to the side of the computer. Then learned because I have a protective shell on the MackBook, the flush fitting adaptor may not fit. This is why I went with a plug in adaptor. Also bought this one because it accepts memory cards from cameras.
customer_reviews.author: door knocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After looking all over the internet for the best USBc hub, and after reading all the reviews, I finally decided to go with the CharJen Pro. This multi port works great. I've been using it for a few weeks now on my new 2018 Macbook Pro and I haven't had any trouble with it yet. Once you plug it in, its ready to go. No installations, no set ups. Just plug it in and connect your SD/usb drives or devices, and its ready to go. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: Solid, portable, practicle
customer_reviews.text: The limited number of USB C ports in the latest computers (Mac or PC) make it necessary to purchase a hub. In my case it needs to be durable travel companion with my new iMac Pro. The quality of the case gave me the first positive impression, it is solidly built. Before the purchase, I considered models that attached to the side of the Mac, decided on CJ0524 because it did not block both USB C ports.
customer_reviews.author: Ganzo

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I labored over the different choices for a hub since I knew it would be put to heavy use. I'm glad I chose the CharJenPro! I read through the reviews about customer service and I was sold. I haven't experienced any problems with excessive heat that some mentioned. It's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Campbell

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago. It worked find at first but connectivity issues were popping up at 6 months. The connector from the device to the computer is faulty and when you jiggle it in any way, your connection cuts in and out. You get what you pay for. Don't buy this. You will have to get a new one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: So far, working great!
customer_reviews.text: I have watched an online review of this product on YouTube in which it came out on top of its competition after rigorous testing. I wasn't able to test all the functions myself, but so far it is working perfectly fine with an external hard-drive and a memory card. It is smaller than I imagined, which is very good, and can comfortably be attached to the usb-c charging cable at all time. Please do keep in mind that once the computer goes into sleep mode, the card is disconnected, though I believe that is normal. Shipping to Israel was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Yoav

customer_reviews.title: ... the ports function as advertised and port selection is excellent. Appearance is great and outgoing USB-C connecting wire ...
customer_reviews.text: All of the ports function as advertised and port selection is excellent. Appearance is great and outgoing USB-C connecting wire is heavy-duty. No problems with ports thus far. My only wish is that it also included an RJ-45 port for wired network connection. However, in order to add such a port, the footprint would have to be larger and the device half-again as thick as it is, at least, where the RJ-45 port was located.
customer_reviews.author: D.James

customer_reviews.title: Outperforms more expensive adapters
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 Macbook Pro. On my desk I have a fancier, more expensive USB-C hub and, to be honest, the USB ports are a little grumpy. Bought this unit to put into my kit for presentations. Works flawlessly. It even plays nice with my standard USB pointer system while connected to a projector via the HDMI port. Love it when things just work and this just works.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny Minchillo

customer_reviews.title: The only option for new MacBook owners!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying and returning USB-C hubs since I got my new MacBook Pro, and they have all been cheap, or not worth the money I paid (some of them over $100!). This product, the CharJenPro USB C Hub is definitely going to be staying with me. It is high quality, well made and really good looking too! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and works exactly like expected!
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I forget to leave reviews but this one I won’t. Jenny & Charlie wrote me a hand-written thank you card! I was shocked. I did not think a big corporation would take the time out of their day to do that so I’m making sure to give them the 5-stars! Besides the great customer service the actual product is perfect. It does what it says it’s going to do! I haven’t had it for a long time but overall it’s a perfect size and works which is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: I saw this device on YouTube compared to a number of other devices. It has performed extremely well in my application of expanding my Surface Go USB-C port. I use it to drive a large HDMI monitor in a two monitor setup. I also use it for connecting the usb transmitter for a wireless mouse and keyboard. It will also support a microSD card, an SD card, and a usb memory stick simultaneously. It is fast and works just as well on my HP 15inch X360.
customer_reviews.author: RSende

customer_reviews.title: CharJen Temporarily
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Graphic Designer, Illustrator, and Photographer so I work with multiple external hard drives, external drawing display and of course my phone. I absolutely loved my Hub. It worked just as expected, and it looks nice too! A little over a year later, it overheats and shuts off USB functions completely. Only one and maybe two USBs works at the same time now. Also when you disconnect one thing, everything else plugged into it resets too (HDMI, USB, SD.) All in all, I recommend this item for the casual user rather than the heavy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J

customer_reviews.title: Solid connection, acceptable speeds. Great dongle
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I wasn't expecting much out of this. The transfer speeds over the USB are completely acceptable. It won't break any records like the units that cost over $100. But it's a perfect little "on the go" hub when you need to plug in USB accessories. Have not had any compatibility issues at all. USB C connection is sturdy and does not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Rob BTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: USB-C Hub that simply works
customer_reviews.text: With my usb mouse plug in and proceed to plug the hub into the usb-c port on the MacBook, it works instantly. Fast and easy! No hassle! I have went thru 3 different usb-c hub before arriving on this usb-c hub. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tran

customer_reviews.title: Only hub that worked
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many hubs for my XPS 9380. This worked better than all of them. All hubs that I used have serious connectivity issues when connecting more than one USB device to them. This one has less problems. Only when transferring huge amounts of files through the USB ports, it has problems. You also get great support and service from supplier. This is actually the best hub I found and used. I advice everyone to have one. After one year of experience with it, I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Multi-tasking USB-C champ
customer_reviews.text: Great hub for USB-C equipped laptops (like my 12-inch MacBook). Can charge the laptop while connected to USB devices, and the SD card reader works very well at USB 3 speeds. A little on the bulky side compared to one of those tiny USB-to-USB C adapters, but for all of the connections included it's less bulky than having a separate device for each purpose. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Reiber

customer_reviews.title: hard drives become disconnected
customer_reviews.text: Hard drives plugged into the USB ports on this hub become disconnected, giving the message "disconnected without ejecting". I've tested it, and this _does not_ happen with a different hub that I bought:  This is a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Alverson

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It has the perfect amount of ports. I especially like that it is not the type that connects and rests flush against my MacBook pro- I would worry that it could be bumped and have parts broken off in side my MacBook. I do not have to worry about that with this charGen Pro because it sits 5 1/2 inches from my laptop when it is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: marshall200

customer_reviews.title: Their communication was excellent, and I received a discount for a new ...
customer_reviews.text: My experience started out with a problem...when I attached one of my older WD usb external drives, the CharJenPro became very hot! I emailed the company, and this is where the story becomes positive. I returned the defective unit. Their communication was excellent, and I received a discount for a new unit, which works very well. I will use this unit for travel with my MacBook Pro. It is small and light, matches my silver laptop, and I have no qualms about recommending it. Exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.author: MaM

customer_reviews.title: Does all it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a MacBook, provides a good amount of connectivity that the computer is missing. Color is SLIGHTLY off, doesn't quite match the rose gold of the MacBook, otherwise it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Eichenberger

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced given that it doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the SD, microSD card reader. At times when I place my 32gb micro sd card in the microSD card reader, my laptop doesn't recognize it.Additionally, when I use my micro sd card adapter on the hub, my laptop doesn't recognize it either. I used a different adapter with a different microSD card, and the laptop still didn't recognize it. I tested this on another laptop and again it didn't work. For the price, it's not worth it. tldr: The sd card reader seems to not read adapters, inconsistent in reading microsd cards.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Conectivity at it's finest!
customer_reviews.text: First of all thank for the fast shipping! The USB C HUB works as advertised. Great company CHARJEN! The card in side the box added to presentation. The device is well made and truly reccomend purchasing it. I'm looking forward to other items you have to offer.
customer_reviews.author: willcall63

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the USB hub. It has allowed me to really clean up my computer space. The hub does not supply power to my external USB drives. The Amazon listing makes it seem that way, but its not so. I think I may have misunderstood though. One negative I will say is that I have noticed a decrease in Read/Write speeds. This doesn't really bother me, but if writing a large file like a Time Machine backup on Mac, you will notice it. I have not done an actual read/write speed test with a program or anything, this is just my unproven opinion. Overall I would say the product is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Colt Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great! Very personable company!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it since the day I got it, works great. When I use a product like this, the less I have to notice it or think about it the better it is. Today I received a hand written letter from staff from the company thanking me for the product and giving me a contact email in case I had any problems. Will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: HUNTER BIRKELBACH

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use on a 2017 Macbook pro ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a 2017 Macbook pro. It works really well, and has almost everything I need in the way of ports. My only wish is that it also had ethernet! That said, it's light weight, really well made, and fits in my laptop bag perfectly. I'd definitely buy it again, no complaints at all!!
customer_reviews.author: VT Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not told the whole story
customer_reviews.text: Advertising can be so misleading. This was supposed to work with my iPad but the manufacturer’s website says different. When I contacted them I was told I would have to pay a small fee to ask a question of the tech dept. sent it back on principle.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Works but interferes with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I have used the USB and HDMI outputs, and the device has allowed me to use this laptop with only a single usb-c port for all uses including power. This is great! However, it seems that the CharJen device interferes with the computer's bluetooth connectivity. I had hoped that by choosing one of these heavier and better reviewed models to avoid the interference issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my Lenovo c930 laptop using the thunder bolt 3 port
customer_reviews.text: It works awesome as I said above on my Lenovo. I only gave it 3 stars because it would not be recognized at all on my home desk top which has a new MSI Z390 Pro mother board with 2 thunder 3 ports. Neither port works with this device?
customer_reviews.author: R. Zellmer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations in function and form. Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this USB-C hub/adapter for about two months now, and it has exceeded expectations. First and foremost, the hub/adapter functions as intended. Pass-through charging works great--I have a 12" Macbook (2017), and the hub charges my computer at full speed. I have used the hub for large data transfers that took hours, and it did not overheat and did not drop the connection. The device itself feels very solid, and the aluminum finish matches my Macbook exactly. Very happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Hub and 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I originally brought this hub because I saw it recommended by a tech guy on YouTube. I do photography and I need a reliable hub with high transfer speeds. After 7 months the sd card reader wasn't working but after trying to help with the issue CharJen replaced the item free of charge. Most companies may say 1 year warranty but they really stick to their word with it. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is a well-thought out design that really performs.
customer_reviews.text: No other accessory can do what this does so well. I find it will do all the adaptation I need for my various media connections to my Macbook and it does it with style. I'm glad I found it. Just follow the directions and you will get all the versatility it is designed to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional using multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I tired charging (pass-through), operating 2 external 2.5" HDDs, a USB Flash stick, a microSD card, and HDMI video output simultaneously using my MacBook 12", and everything worked well! I feel it has a nice premium feel to it. I think the matte silver finish looks and feels very close to my MacBook. The seller even sent me a very nice thank you card :D Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome USB-C! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few other brands of USB-C on Amazon and had issues with multiple devices being plugged into it and it not working or wifi interference, which is super frustrating. So I decided to try this one and pay a little more! Totally worth it!! I didn't have any issues thus far. The material feels just like my macbook pro 2017! It's not heavy and bulky, super lightweight. It even has little rubbery things on the bottom to keep it in place on the desk. Absolutely awesome product and I carry it with my macbook pro at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Ingenious marketing!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I am writing this review because I received a hand-written thank you note which offers some perks for leaving feedback. That alone would not typically be enough to prompt a review from me unless I agreed that the product was good. It is, however, excellent marketing and shows that the founders are serious about the success of their product(s). This is a really good product. It gives me all the functionality I need from my USB-C port, in a sleek device that matches the color AND build quality of my Space Gray MacBook Pro. I look forward to future products from CharJenPro. Especially some kind of improvement to the horrendous OEM USB-C charger. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Hockley

customer_reviews.title: This has been great with one exception
customer_reviews.text: This has been great adapter. I love the fast download speed from SD cards. I bought two, one for me and one for my wife. The only thing that buyers should know is that this device is not compatible with Apple SuperDrive USB DVD drive. I may be the exception, but am fully aware that most users will probably have little need for transferring media to DVD. It's still worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Works Great w/ MacBook Pro 2018
customer_reviews.text: Sure makes life easier, I have two USB external drives, a USB Audient audio interface an extra monitor all connected w/o issue, also using the charging pass thru to charge the MBP. Haven't tried the card reader yet but everything else is as advertised. Very happy w/ my purchase. With the CharJenPro USB C Hub I still have three Thunderbolt 3 ports available.
customer_reviews.author: StevieT

product_meta.title: CharJenPro USB C Hub for MacBook Pro 16", 15", 13", 2020, 2019, 2018, MacBook Air 2020, 2019, 2018, USB C Power, HDMI 4K, 3 USB 3.0, microSD, SD Card Reader.
feature_bullets: For all USB C, tablets, phones. This is for the Space Gray body with WHITE cable (not black cable).
HDMI: connect to monitors/TVs. 4K@30Hz.  USB C Power Delivery port: charges your device.
3 USB 3.0: for external hard drives, flash/thumb drives, printers, all USB devices.
SD and MICRO SD CARD READERS: transfer images, videos, files.
CharJenPro founded in the USA. Any issues, please contact us: www.charjenpro.com/support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,671 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
